name: supex
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe), wor(c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp(sup(c0, c1, c2)∈ 𝕌, c2 ≺ c1)

body.origin:
|- wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe)
-| wor(c2, c1)
-| wi(wor(c2, c1), wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe)
-| wor(c2, c1)
-| wi(wor(c2, c1), wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wor(c2, c1), wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe))
-| wi(wor(c2, c1), wor(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe)
-| wor(c2, c1)
-| wi(wor(c2, c1), wor(c2, c1))

|- wcel(csup(c0, c1, c2), universe)
-| wor(c2, c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ sup(c0, c1, c2)∈ 𝕌
⊣ c2 ≺ c1

comment: A supremum is a set. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1999.)
